Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.team11

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LightSensorObserver
    Observer pattern implementation for the line detection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClawMotorController
    This class controls the motors for the claw and its lifting mechanism.
    Constants
    The Constants class contains all the constants to be used in other classes.
    Display
    Display class handles showing any vital info on the LCD of the EV3 brick during runtime.
    Initializer
    This class bootstraps the robot by initializing every system.
    LightSensorController
    Operates the light sensor that will be pointed downwards in order to detect lines for odometry correction purposes.
    Logger
    Logs any data passed to it into a file to be later used for debugging purposes.
    Main
    TODO
    Navigation
    This class controls the motors and moves the robot according to the information given by the odometer.
    Odometer
    This class implements a basic odometer that keep tracks of the position of the robot using the rotation data from the wheel motors.
    USLocalization
    Performs localization using the ultrasonic sensor and the rising edge method.
    USSensorController
    Operates the ultrasonic sensor used to measure distances in front of the robot.
    Util
    Provides a assortment of utility methods that are used throughout the project.
    WifiClient
    Connects to competition server and retrieve data
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StartCorner
